name: Cheesy Bacon Slider Bake
author: KKraft
summary: Great for a party or dinner.
ingredients: ½ (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes with garlic and onion
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place rolls, without separating them, on a flat work surface
Arrange bottom half in the prepared pan
Sprinkle 1 cup Cheddar cheese on top
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, 3 to 5 minutes
Cook and stir beef and onion in a skillet until beef is browned, 5 to 8 minutes
Stir in tomatoes, 1 1/2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 1 1/2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper
Cook until fully combined, 1 to 2 minutes
Sprinkle remaining 1 cup Cheddar cheese and bacon on top
Cover with top half of rolls
Combine butter, brown sugar, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, and 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce in a microwave-safe bowl
Cover and microwave on high until butter is melted, about 1 minute
Stir until blended and pour over rolls
Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, until golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes
